name: Video size on the youtube home page
description:
Go back to the previous video icon design on the youtube home page.
Or adjust your size and quantity

Формат свой размер / Format your size - 250px!important

Формат кол-во / Qty format - 10!important


Изменить вручную / To change manually
https://i.imgur.com/ULq0Cnf.png
additional_info: Added skeleton screen style (the skeleton screen adjusts to the settings).

style_settings.label: Кол-во в строке / The number in the string
